price: Mnayo humo matunda mengi mtakayo yala.
arabic: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ كَثِيرَةٞ مِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: Humo mtapata matunda ya namna nyingi, na kwa wingi, mtastarehe kuyala.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lakum fīhā fākihatun kathīratun min'hā takulūna
